mapper.select: SELECT s.status_no, s.member_no, s.posting_no, s.first_pass, s.final_pass, s.interview_date, p.company_no, p.posting_title, p.posting_sdate, p.posting_edate FROM application_status s JOIN job_posting p ON s.posting_no = p.posting_no WHERE company_no = #{company_no};
